title: WOW
body: why is it that the one time i bug splat i get the 5 leaver buster fuckking thanks

replies.body: If you have a history of leaving you are much more prone to Leaver Busters.
i havent left a game in like a long time the only problem is league says that i have no network and it disconnects i reset everything and i cant do anything about the disconnection

Leaving games includes disconnecting, the effect on your team is the same. If you've been disconnecting a lot recently then that would also leave you prone to LBs.

If you're having connection issues, take a look at lagreport.com. It should give you an idea of the quality of your connection, and indicate as to whether it's on your end or your ISPs.
